amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the language of the bill with the text of the "Complete Homeland Security Act".
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 24 printed in House Report 109-84. The amendment authorizes $6.9 billion over H.R. 1817 in homeland security funding. Also includes a number of policy proposals to close security gaps and to restructure DHS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 230 (Roll no. 187).

action.text: Amendment (A023) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Thompson (MS).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Thompson (MS).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Thompson (MS) amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 230 (Roll no. 187).
